name: 吳斯偉
objective: This course is to analyze the macroeconomic policy, international economy, business cycles, government policy, exchange rate and other macroeconomic-related issues. The course will be taught with case studies and journal literature. Group discussions are needed.
schedule:
a 週次　　單元
一　　Introduction
二　　The data of macroeconomics
三　　National income
四　　Money and inflation
五　　The open economy
六　　Unemployment
七　　Economic growth I
八　　Economic growth II
九　　Midterm exam
十　　Economic fluctuations
十一　　Aggregate demand
十二　　Aggregate supply
十三　　IS-LM model I
十四　　IS-LM model II
十五　　IS-LM model III
十六　　Macroeconomic policy
十七　　Macroeconomic policy
十八　　Final exam
